info.title: Project Showcase API
info.description: API for developer project showcasing platform

post.description: Generate a presigned URL for uploading an image.
Mark an image upload as complete.
Set the main image for a project.

get.description: List all competitions the current user is assigned to review.
Get competition details with projects and reviewer's rankings.

put.description: Update rankings for projects in a competition.
Update the reviewer's status for a competition.

get.description:
Get project details for a reviewer.

Returns the project if the user is assigned as a reviewer to any
competition that contains this project. Returns 404 otherwise.
List all approved and pending tags (excludes rejected).

List tags grouped by category (excludes rejected tags).

If with_projects=true, only returns tags with at least one approved project.

post.description: Suggest a new tag (creates with status=pending, immediately usable).

get.description: List pending tags for review (admin only).

put.description: Reject a tag (admin only). Removes tag from all projects.

PresignedUploadRequest.description: Request schema for generating presigned upload URL.
PresignedUploadRequest.title: PresignedUploadRequest

ReviewCompetitionResponse.description: Competition that the current user is assigned to review.
ReviewCompetitionResponse.title: ReviewCompetitionResponse

ReviewCompetitionDetailResponse.description: Competition detail with projects and reviewer's rankings.
ReviewCompetitionDetailResponse.title: ReviewCompetitionDetailResponse

ReviewProjectResponse.description: Project within a competition being reviewed, with ranking info.
ReviewProjectResponse.title: ReviewProjectResponse

RankingUpdateRequest.description: Request to update rankings for a competition.
RankingUpdateRequest.title: RankingUpdateRequest

StatusUpdateRequest.description: Request to update the reviewer's status for a competition.
StatusUpdateRequest.title: StatusUpdateRequest

ReviewProjectDetailResponse.description: Full project details for a reviewer.
ReviewProjectDetailResponse.title: ReviewProjectDetailResponse
